# Post-War Surplus of Women
## Area Diverging

```{r, out.width = "60%", fig.align = 'center', fig.cap="Photo from the Australian War Memorial"}
masthead <- "assets/victory-job.jpg"
knitr::include_graphics(masthead, dpi=72)

```

> The Second World War created the need for a new generation of female heroes...\
--- Kathryn J. Atwood


***

### Ingest
#### data for 1950 and 2018

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=TRUE, class.source = 'fold-hide'}

url_root <- "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/UN-AVT/kamino-source/main/sources/0-shared/data/"
url_file <- "surplus-of-women/surplus-of-women.csv"
url <- paste0(url_root, url_file)

df <- read.csv(url, header = TRUE)
colnames(df) <- c("age", "Y1950", "Y2018")

head(df, n = 10)

```

### Wrangle
#### convert to number

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=TRUE, class.source='fold-hide'}

df_wrangle <- df
df_wrangle[91:100,2] <- 0
df_wrangle$Y1950 <- as.numeric(df_wrangle$Y1950)

head(df_wrangle, n=10)

```


### Plot
#### area and annotate

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=TRUE, class.source='fold-hide', fig.align='center', out.width="100%"}

theme_opts <- theme(
    text = element_text(family = "inconsolata"), 
    plot.title = element_text(color = "black", size = 18, face = "bold", family = "inconsolata"),
    plot.subtitle = element_text(color = "black", size = 16, family = "inconsolata"),
    plot.caption = element_text(color = "#555555", size = 8, family = "inconsolata"),
    axis.title.x = element_blank(),
    axis.title.y = element_blank(),
    # axis.text.x = element_text(vjust = 12),
    panel.border = element_blank(),
    panel.background = element_blank(),
    #panel.grid.minor = element_blank(), # remove minor gridlines
    panel.grid.major.x = element_blank(), # remove x (vertical) gridlines
    legend.title = element_blank(), # remove legend title
    legend.text = element_text(color = "black", size = 8),
    legend.position='top'
  )


v1 <- ggplot(df_wrangle) + 
  geom_area(aes(x = age, y = Y2018), fill = '#8395a8', alpha = 0.8)+
  geom_area(aes(x = age, y = Y1950), fill = '#f2d9a2', alpha = 0.8)+
  geom_line(aes(x = age, y = Y1950), color = 'white', size = 1)+
  annotate("text", x = 40, y = 50000, label = "Surplus\nof women\nin 1950", size = 4, colour = "#bb7213", fontface = 2, family = "inconsolata")+
  annotate("text", x = 83, y = 50000, label = "Surplus\nof women\nin 2018", size = 4, colour = "#152845", fontface = 2, family = "inconsolata")+
  annotate("text", x = 28, y = -12000, label = "Surplus of men\nin 2018", size = 4, colour = "#152845", fontface = 2, family = "inconsolata")+
  annotate("text", x = 100, y = -40000, label = "Age", size = 4, colour = "#152845", fontface = 2, family = "inconsolata")+
  labs(title = "Surplus of women due to World War fades in Germany, but higher life expectancy\nstill causes a plus of elderly women",
       subtitle = "Differences between number of men and women for each age, in 1950 (yellow) and 2018(blue), in Germany",
       y="", x="",
       caption = "Inspiration: Lisaa Charlotte Rost, Data Wrapper")+
  theme_bw() + 
  theme_opts
  
  
girafe(ggobj = v1, width_svg = 16, height_svg = 9,
       options = list(opts_sizing(rescale = TRUE, width = 0.9)))

```
